description:
go.tools/ssa: fix bug in code emitted for ast.TypeAssertExpr.

var x I = ...
x.(E) may fail dynamically (iff x is nil).

Added a testcase.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5ae342ab16a5&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: fix bug in code emitted for ast.TypeAssertExpr.

var x I = ...
x.(E) may fail dynamically (iff x is nil).

Added a testcase.
